extends java.lang.Object
implements UIInterface, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent>

      • getTask

        public Task getTask(int index)
             throws TaskNotFoundException
        Description copied from interface: UIInterface
        Retrieves the Task object associated with the index provided. The general contract is that the display will associate an unique integer index to each Task object whenever UIInterface.display(ArrayList) is called
        Specified by:
        getTask in interface UIInterface
        Parameters:
        index - Integer index associated with a displayed Task object
        Returns:
        Task object associated with the provided index
        Throws:
        TaskNotFoundException - Thrown when the provided index is out of bounds

      • popFilter

        public Filter popFilter()
        Description copied from interface: UIInterface
        Removes the final Filter object in the filter chain and returns it. If only the root filter is remaining, this method does nothing and returns null
        Specified by:
        popFilter in interface UIInterface
        Returns:
        Popped Filter object or null if only the root Filter remains

      • showChangeDataFilePathDialog

        public boolean showChangeDataFilePathDialog()
        Description copied from interface: UIInterface
        Shows a file picker dialog which prompts the user to select a FunDUE data file. Returns true if a file is successfully chosen, the user's preference will be updated and the selected file will used as the FunDUE data file.
        Specified by:
        showChangeDataFilePathDialog in interface UIInterface
        Returns:
        True if a file was selected, false otherwise.

      • showHelpPage

        public boolean showHelpPage()
        Description copied from interface: UIInterface
        Shows the window containing the FunDUE Help Page. Return value indicates whether the window was opened by the method.
        Specified by:
        showHelpPage in interface UIInterface
        Returns:
        True if the FunDUE Help Page was shown, false if the window was already showing.
